issue.title: Valkyrie Falling to Ground due to Java Exceptions

content.raw: So, the changes to the alternatives has stopped the java exceptions. However, the robot still cannot stand, even with the updates to srcsim. @nmertins , I would like to trace the control flow, and see if I can find where the controller fails to interface with the simulator. Along those lines, what topics, either ROS or Gazebo, would indicate joint effort, and where in the control loop do they occur? Right now, this is the only roadblock in my development for this competition. It would be a shame to not qualify due to the provided code simply not working in my case.

However, the robot still cannot stand, even with the updates to srcsim. @nmertins , I would like to trace the control flow, and see if I can find where the controller fails to interface with the simulator. Along those lines, what topics, either ROS or Gazebo, would indicate joint effort, and where in the control loop do they occur? Right now, this is the only roadblock in my development for this competition. It would be a shame to not qualify due to the provided code simply not working in my case.
